alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 1:18PM CST until February 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. .Heavy rain that fell last week, combined with expected rain this week, will cause continued rises on the Big Muddy River. For the Big Muddy River...including Murphysboro...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Muddy River near Murphysboro. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CST Sunday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 23.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
